reviewTitle: A Game Changer for Laptop Movie Nights!
reviewDescription: I recently purchased the boAt Stone Spinx Pro Bluetooth Speaker, and let me tell you, it's been a game changer for my movie nights! As someone who loves to binge-watch shows and movies on my laptop, I've always found the built-in audio to be lackluster. But with this powerful portable speaker, I can finally enjoy immersive sound quality from the comfort of my bed or couch.The 20W RMS sound output is truly impressive, delivering crisp highs and deep lows that bring every scene to life. Whether it's the explosive action sequences or the subtle nuances of dialogue, this speaker handles it all with ease. Plus, the Bluetooth connectivity makes it super convenient to set up, allowing me to seamlessly stream audio from my laptop without any hassle.Not only does the boAt Stone Spinx Pro enhance my viewing experience, but its portability also means I can take it with me wherever I go. Whether I'm traveling or just moving from room to room, I can always count on this speaker to deliver stunning audio quality.Overall, I couldn't be happier with my purchase. If you're like me and enjoy watching movies or shows on your laptop, do yourself a favor and invest in the boAt Stone Spinx Pro Bluetooth Speaker. Highly recommended for anyone looking to elevate their audio experience!

reviewTitle: Incorrect marketing of microphone , Okay speakers...not for halls
reviewDescription: I bought this speaker since it also supported microphone and the description clearly stated can use the speaker as hands free for finishing work calls but the microphone is muffled. I reported the issue but they would not take a return and offered an exchange. The exchanged product same issue which is a manufacturers defect. I didn't have the time to go through the hassle of arguing with customer service and booking a return after one exchange and then reordering another product... The speaker is decent for music, bass is okay could've been better. The speaker is okay for a bedroom not for a hall. My Android TV speakers have better volume than the boat stone. I'm just making buyers aware. I got it for 3k but I wouldn't have spent so much when the microphone doesn't work I'm sure there are good enough speaker's for a lesser range. Rating 2 coz of the microphone else it would be a 3 range as a rating for the speaker quality as compared to price.
Sound is not much loud and clear
